content: spill is a shawl worked in row in a gradient yarn with short row used to create a gradual off-center color change crochet it with a long gradient yarn or use a few different colors to create asymmetrical stripes spill is a crescent shape that measures about 48 122 cm along the inside curve and about 14 35 5 cm deep in the center difficulty easy includes 3 pages of written instructions and photographs **erratum** notes second note should read as follows both the slip_stitch and the ***single_crochet*** where the slip_stitch is worked count as stitches as shown in figure 1 on page 2 **clarification** even row each even row is worked as follows single_crochet in each **double_crochet** when working an even row immediately after a short row do not work a single_crochet into the slip_stitch at the end of the short row http //www lifeadorned com/crochet-pattern-spill/ 1 http //www lifeadorned com/making-of-the-spill-shawl/ 2 1 http //www lifeadorned com/crochet-pattern-spill/ 2 http //www lifeadorned com/making-of-the-spill-shawl/
